segments.text: I heard you were promoted to general manager of IBM ’ s China Head quarters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s true . I got the news yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You did a good job for the company . So , this is your first day in the new position . How do you feel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad . I ’ m confident . And I like challenges .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I believe you are cut out for this position .
segments.speaker: S1
